meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express surprise or emphasis.
meanings.sent1: Heckuva! That was a loud noise!
meanings.sent2: She did a heckuva job on her school project.
meanings.sent3: Heckuva! You scared me with that prank.
meanings.sent4: The thunder was a heckuva reminder of nature's power.
meanings.sent5: The roller coaster was a heckuva thrill ride.

meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express admiration or approval.
meanings.sent1: She sings heckuva well in the choir.
meanings.sent2: He did a heckuva job fixing the car.
meanings.sent3: The chef cooks heckuva delicious meals.
meanings.sent4: The sunset was a heckuva beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The athlete ran a heckuva fast race.
